statements: DELETE FROM WasteMaterialsInventory WHERE id = 1 AND supplier_id = 100;

DELETE FROM entry_logs WHERE entry_type = 'incoming' AND quantity >= 100;
DELETE FROM material_inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' AND quantity <= 100;
